description: Try our easy to follow Pork Fillet With Mandarin & Ginger Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork Fillet With Mandarin & Ginger Sauce
name: Pork Fillet With Mandarin & Ginger Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the broccolini in a saucepan of boiling water for 2 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Slice pork and serve with the rice and broccolini, with the sauce spooned over.
